events.message: I placed my order over two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't been updated.
The reported problem involves a significant shipping delay with the customer's recent order.
Customer case assigned to delivery specialist team to resolve the shipping and tracking issue.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the delay in your shipment. Let me check your order status right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the delay?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thanks for the info. Our shipping partner has reported a delay due to weather issues. We expect your package will arrive within three more days.
I understand the situation, but I hope the package arrives soon as I need it urgently.
Escalating the case to senior logistics team to prioritize your shipment due to urgency.
Your shipment has been prioritized and is now out for delivery. You should receive it by the end of today.
Checking in to confirm that your package was delivered and to see if everything is satisfactory with your order.
Yes, I received the package yesterday and everything is perfect now. Thanks for your help resolving this delay.
We are happy to hear your order arrived safely. Closing this case now, and feel free to contact us anytime.
